changes.description: The behavior infrastructure now uses ComponentProvider and allows adding custom behaviors
Extend Tab with the tabAlignment and accordionView properties
Add custom Text variant styling
fix: Autocomplete handles animations correctly
Add margin-related theme variables to ContentSeparator
Add applyIf property to Theme
fix: external animation is now correctly applied to ModalDialogs as well
Added better error text when rendering FormItem outside of a Form.
refactor: Select and AutoComplete components
The itemLabelWidth value of Form now supports theme variables ($space-\* values).
AppState now uses a merge operation to set initialValue
fix: itemWithLabel - layout issue
Add checkboxTolerance property to Table
test: review onFocus, onBlur e2e tests
Renamed the following properties in DatePicker: minValue -> startDate, maxValue -> endDate. Also updated component documentation.
refactor: use labelBehavior instead of ItemWithLabel
Add back removed RadioItem
Fixed FormItem validation indicators to use a relaxed validation indication strategy.
fix: labelBehavior, input components - styling issue
Undust and improve the Tree component
Fixed Slider ranged version where only the first thumb is interactable.
improve: remove cmdk from autocomple, add keywords prop to option
fix: NumberBox initialValue ignores non-convertible string values, minValue and maxValue now applies to typed-in input as well as to increments / decrements with spinner buttons.
refactor: move behavior application earlier in ComponentAdapter render flow
Add the data property to the Pdf component
Add the "transform" layout property
Add syncWithAppState and initiallySelected properties to Table
Fix MenuSeparator and SubMenuitem (forwardRef)
fix: NavGroup componenet's iconVertical{Expanded,Collapsed} properties now apply based on it's 'open' state. Only the Expanded one was present before the fix.
Allow event handlers to use nested action components recursively
feat: introducing behaviors - tooltip, animation, label
fix: Modal dialog scrolling issue
Allow image to accept binary data (and use it instead of src)
Allow user-defined components in extension packages
Fixed Slider input type, label focus, readOnly property, as well as min & max value issues.
Fixed feature to add custom icons for the Carousel prev/next page buttons.
Added short debounce to ColorPicker to make changing color values with slider a bit smoother.
fix: assigning new properties to objects in xmlui script
fix: stricter empty body detection in RestApiProxy
fix: TextArea autofocus
fix: dropdownMenu overflow
fix: ability to use user defined components in triggerTemplate (dropdownMenu)
select: use focus-visible instead of focus for outline
fix: modal dialog/toast issue
form: hideButtonRowUntilDirty
